casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. ROTH
v.
EIGHTH DIST. COURT OF APPEALS 2018-1801 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 8, 2019

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Relators' renewed and restated motion for expedited alternative writ and emergency stay of proceedings in common pleas court denied as moot. Cause dismissed. O'CONNOR, C.J., and KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, and DONNELLY, JJ., concur. STEWART, J., not participating.
